FuncDef: This command specifies the maximum number of remote routes that can be held within a VPN routing/ forwarding (VRF) context. Thelocal,host,staticandaggregateroutes are not counted.

ParaDef.Info: An integer that specifies the maximum number of routes to be held in a VRF context. Values-1 to 2147483647.
Specifies that if the maximum limit is reached, only log the event. log-only does not disable the learning of new routes.

The percentage at which a warning log message and SNMP trap should be set. There are two warnings, the first is a mid-level warning at the threshold value set and the second is a high-level warning at level between the maximum number of routes and the mid-level rate ([mid+max] / 2). Values-0 to 100.

ExtraInfo: Default: 0 or disabled - The threshold will not be raised.
